    • getHyperparameters

      public Map<String,Object> getHyperparameters()
      Description copied from interface: HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns a snapshot of all current hyperparameters.

      The returned map should contain stable, human-readable keys (such as "learningRate" or "momentum") mapped to their current values. Implementations are encouraged to return a defensive copy so that external modifications do not affect the internal state.

      Specified by:
      getHyperparameters in interface HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns:
      an immutable or defensive copy of the current hyperparameters

    • setHyperparameter

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      value - the new hyperparameter value
